post_body: Emergency for a job opportunity in Vilnius

commenti.body: You can try Workis for some short term jobs.
This is not an immediate solution but try teaching english in Preply, it is good for some extra cash.

There are lots of cleaning jobs available in Vilnius but most are quite low paid and often want full time staff. You could try advertising your services on Facebook groups oriented towards foreigners. Maybe you could offer pet sitting or dog walking services. Hotels and bars always need staff so it might actually just be worth going into a few and asking if thereâ€™s anything available.

I donâ€™t know what your native language is but offering to teach that might be useful.
What are you studying? If I may ask
Check out Facebook group "Vilnius mokytojai", there are often preschool/school that are looking for english teachers.
The only effective advice: straight up go to restaurants and cafes and ask if they gave an openings, posting on socials won't help.

How did you move to Vilnius without a stable income to begin with?
I'm guessing you're not from Lithuania, you're also not part of Erasmus programme because you would have gotten a stipend...

So, how?
Try registering on Paslaugos.lt for photo and teaching work
Uber eats, wolt, pizza delivery, any food delivery. They will hire anyone as long as you have a drivers license and a car or you can even rent a car.

Have you looked at Skelbiu job listings at all? There are plenty of low wage jobs offered like you listed. If you dont speak any Lithuanian it will be harder but far from impossible. 

I mean buy a cheap used bicycle then deliver with uber eats.

You should try contacting photographers and studios to check if they need any hands on deck as this is probably the busiest month of the year for most. Solo photographers might not have spare recourses to offer, but if youâ€™d make yourself useful in redundant tasks like for example culling photos it could be an great opportunity
Check out the Fotografai Vilniuje group on Facebook. You may get some photography work there
I agree. Share your work and someone will notice you. Iâ€™m also would be interested ðŸ™‚
Such a cool idea! Thank you <3
